Title: Designates September eleventh of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Emergency Responders' Appreciation Day"
Summary: Designates September eleventh of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Emergency Responders' Appreciation Day".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to designating September eleventh of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Emergency Responders' Appreciation Day"
